root_cause_analysis.blocking_condition: LIARS_POKER stress mode activated due to stale price data
causal_chain: 1. Price data last ingested ~2.3 hours prior to Wave 12 execution
4. All 20 hypotheses generated but downgraded/rejected due to stress
5. No hypotheses reached EQS evaluation (blocked before EQS scoring)

critical_distinction.what_did_not_happen: EQS threshold was never tested (hypotheses never reached EQS scoring)
critical_distinction.implication: Wave 12 cannot validate EQS > 0.85 capability under compromised data conditions

system_behavior_assessment.note: Wave 10 proved restraint. Wave 11.1 proved judgment under clean conditions. Wave 12 re-demonstrated restraint under stress conditions - which is correct but not the intended test.

exam_verdict.reason: Cannot evaluate EQS > 0.85 capability when stress detector blocks hypothesis acceptance

immediate: Wave 12 result is INCONCLUSIVE, not FAILED
System behaved correctly given compromised data quality
The exam cannot proceed without 'perfect conditions' as per CEO Directive

options_for_ceo.description: Ingest fresh price data (< 30 min), then re-run Wave 12
options_for_ceo.implication: Requires authorization to ingest data during code freeze
options_for_ceo.recommendation: PREFERRED - Allows proper Golden Needle evaluation

options_for_ceo.description: Accept that system demonstrates correct restraint behavior
options_for_ceo.recommendation: NOT_RECOMMENDED - Does not answer the exam question

options_for_ceo.option: C - Defer Wave 12 to Market Hours
options_for_ceo.description: Schedule Wave 12 during market hours when data is naturally fresh

vega_recommendations.note: CEO Directive stated 'Wave 12 is about truth under perfect conditions' - current conditions are not perfect

conclusion.path_forward: CEO decision required on precondition remediation
